title: Let's be clear here, who ever thought URF was a balanced and fun game mode.
body:
I mean really.

EVERYONE complained about URF last year because it immediately became unbalanced and anti-fun.

So why the hell did people request it to be back?

Like that makes no sense.

Unbalanced + anti-fun = I want it back

Why would anyone want something that became anti-fun to them back?

I'm so lost on this because now people are complaining about it again and I saw it coming from a mile away, OF COURSE IT'S GOING TO BE ANTI-FUN, URF AS A CONCEPT IS UNBALANCED AS FUCK YOU CAN'T GET ANYTHING BALANCED OUT OF IT.

Maybe a little bit of balance.

But you'd have to delete over 70% of the roster because mostly every champion has something unbalanced as fuck in their kit with 80% CDR and no mana costs.
